Text: Kʼuwe̩ aka kakini, ile e̩wñ i ane̩ ñw mi?
Uwe̩ dure fa, ab e-le̩ achʼo?
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ chʼo̩kpakpa fa, ile e̩wñ owñ aje̩ ef e-le̩?
Todabu kʼone̩ ete̩mane̩ chʼo̩gbe̩nugbe̩ amone̩ jʼakwa;
I muda nʼe̩ne̩ du ki aka n, kakini, Ugbo O̩jo̩, Acho̩na-mi,
I aje̩ ñw a nʼibe tʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ile̩ le,
O̩mo̩ ma jʼakwa, i la adohi ñw ma n,
Ab e̩ chaka ka kʼuwe̩ aliʼu n,
Fa-i, ukpe̩ kʼO̩jo̩ ma wa fejudʼe̩ ef uwe̩do̩ n,
todule̩ oñ Job achi alu-wñ ako̩la o̩wai,
